AT.name: Sonic Boom™: Der zerbrochene Kristall
AT.description: In Sonic Boom™: Der zerbrochene Kristall entdeckt Amy eine uralte geheime Sprache und ein Manuskript über die Geschichte und den Fundort eines mächtigen verlorenen Kristalls. Der fiese Schurke Lyric ist ganz scharf auf diese längst vergessene Macht, die im Urwald und in den Schluchten einer mysteriösen neuen Insel versteckt wurde, und hat Amy entführt. Sonic muss nun gemeinsam mit Tails, Knuckles und dem neuen Teammitglied Sticks, die zudem Amys beste Freundin ist, nach ihr suchen und sie aus den Fängen von Lyric und seiner Roboterarmee befreien. Lyric versucht mit allen Mitteln, seine Roboterarmee loszuschicken und Sonic & Co. aufzuhalten, damit er die Welt zerstören kann. Durch Teamarbeit beweisen die Freunde, dass sie gemeinsam stärker sind.

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Der zerbrochene Kristall - Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

AU.name: Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal
AU.description: In Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal, Amy discovers a secret ancient language and manuscript detailing the history and whereabouts of a Lost Crystal of Power. The evil and vile villain, Lyric, kidnaps Amy in his eagerness to get his claws on this long-forgotten power that has been hidden throughout the jungles and canyons of a mysterious new island. Sonic must team up with Tails, Knuckles and newest member of the team Sticks who is Amy’s best friend as they follow her footsteps to save her from the clutches of Lyric and his robot army. Lyric is bent on powering up his army of robots and stopping Sonic and team at all costs in his quest to destroy the world. By working as a team, they will prove they are stronger together than they are apart.

BG.name: Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal
BG.description: In Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal, Amy discovers a secret ancient language and manuscript detailing the history and whereabouts of a Lost Crystal of Power. The evil and vile villain, Lyric, kidnaps Amy in his eagerness to get his claws on this long-forgotten power that has been hidden throughout the jungles and canyons of a mysterious new island. Sonic must team up with Tails, Knuckles and newest member of the team Sticks who is Amy’s best friend as they follow her footsteps to save her from the clutches of Lyric and his robot army. Lyric is bent on powering up his army of robots and stopping Sonic and team at all costs in his quest to destroy the world. By working as a team, they will prove they are stronger together than they are apart.

BE.name: Sonic Boom™ : Le cristal brisé
BE.description: Dans Sonic Boom™ : Le cristal brisé, Amy découvre un ancien dialecte secret et un manuscrit décrivant l'histoire et l'emplacement du cristal perdu de puissance. Animé par son désir de s'emparer de ce pouvoir oublié depuis des siècles dissimulé dans les jungles et les canyons d'une nouvelle île mystérieuse, le terrible et diabolique Lyric kidnappe Amy. Sonic doit s'allier avec Tails, Knuckles et le tout nouveau membre de l'équipe, Sticks, la meilleure amie d'Amy, pour la suivre à la trace et la sauver des griffes de Lyric et de son armée de robots. Lyric est résolu à alimenter son armée robotique et à stopper Sonic et sa bande à tout prix, afin d'accomplir sa destruction du monde. En unissant leur force, ils vont prouver qu'ils sont plus forts ensemble que chacun de leur côté.

movies.name: Sonic Boom : Le cristal brisé - bande-annonce de lancement

ES.name: Sonic Boom™: El Cristal Roto
ES.description: En Sonic Boom™: El Cristal Roto, Amy descubre un idioma antiguo y un manuscrito que habla de la historia y el paradero del poderoso Cristal Perdido. El malvado y vil villano, Lyric, secuestra a Amy con la intención de poner las garras sobre este poder, hace tiempo olvidado, que ha estado oculto en las junglas y cañones de una nueva y misteriosa isla. Sonic deberá formar un equipo con Tails, Knuckles y un nuevo miembro, Sticks, que es la mejor amiga de Amy, y seguirle los pasos para salvarla de Lyric y su ejército de robots. Lyric desea dar vida a su ejército de robots y detener a Sonic y sus amigos a toda costa en su misión para destruir al mundo. Trabajando en equipo, se demostrarán a sí mismos que la unión hace la fuerza.

movies.name: Sonic Boom: El Cristal Roto - Tráiler de lanzamiento

IT.name: Sonic Boom™: Frammenti di cristallo
IT.description: In Sonic Boom™: Frammenti di cristallo, Amy scopre un' antica lingua segreta e un manoscritto che racconta la storia di un potente cristallo perduto e la sua posizione. Il cattivo e spregevole Lyric rapisce Amy allo scopo di mettere gli artigli sul cristallo ormai dimenticato e nascosto nella giungla e nei canyon di una nuova e misteriosa isola. Sonic deve collaborare con Tails, Knuckles e il nuovo membro della squadra, Sticks, per salvare Amy dalle grinfie di Lyric e del suo esercito di robot. Lyric è determinato a potenziare il proprio esercito di robot, ma prima dovrà fermare Sonic e i suoi amici a tutti i costi, perché vogliono impedirgli di distruggere il mondo. Con il lavoro di squadra, dimostreranno che insieme si è più forti.

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Frammenti di cristallo - trailer di lancio

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Shattered Crystal - Launch Trailer

NL.name: Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal
NL.description: In Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal ontdekt Amy een geheime oude taal en een manuscript dat vertelt over de geschiedenis en de locatie van een verloren Crystal of Power. De snode en gemene schurk Lyric kidnapt Amy om deze lang vergeten kracht, die verborgen heeft gelegen in de jungles en ravijnen van een geheimzinnig nieuw eiland, in handen te krijgen. Sonic bundelt zijn krachten met Tails, Knuckles en Sticks, het nieuwste teamlid en de beste vriend van Amy. Samen volgen ze haar spoor om haar te redden uit de klauwen van Lyric en zijn robotleger. Lyric is erop gebrand om zijn robotleger te versterken, Sonic en zijn team tegen elke prijs af te stoppen en de wereld te vernietigen. Door als een team samen te werken, kunnen Sonic en zijn vrienden bewijzen dat ze samen sterker staan dan alleen.

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Shattered Crystal - Introductietrailer

NZ.description: In Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal, Amy discovers a secret ancient language and manuscript detailing the history and whereabouts of a Lost Crystal of Power. By working as a team, they will prove they are stronger together than they are apart.

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Shattered Crystal - Launch Trailer

PT.name: Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal
PT.description: Em Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal, Amy descobre uma antiga linguagem secreta e um manuscrito que detalham a história e paradeiro de um Cristal do Poder perdido. O malvado vilão Lyric rapta Amy na ânsia de deitar as garras a este poder há muito esquecido e que se encontra oculto ao longo das selvas e dos desfiladeiros de uma nova e misteriosa ilha. Sonic tem de se juntar a Tails, Knuckles e Sticks, o mais recente membro da equipa e melhor amiga de Amy, para a salvar das garras de Lyric e do seu exército de robôs. Lyric quer ativar as suas legiões robóticas e travar Sonic e a sua equipa a todo o custo para destruir o mundo. Ao trabalharem em equipa, os amigos vão provar que são mais fortes juntos do que separados.

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Shattered Crystal - Trailer de lançamento

RU.name: Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В игре Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal Эми обнаруживает секретный старинный язык и манускрипт, рассказывающий об истории и местонахождении Потерянного Кристалла Силы. Гнусный злодей Лирик похищает Эми, с помощью которой надеется заполучить давно утраченное могущество, ключи к которому разбросаны по каньонам и джунглям таинственного острова. Сонику, Тейлсу, Наклсу и их новому товарищу Стиксу, лучшему другу Эми, предстоит объединить усилия и вырвать ее из лап Лирика и его армии роботов. Лирик же, одержимый идеей уничтожения мира, продолжает множить свое механическое войско, и он не остановится ни перед чем, чтобы остановить Соника и его друзей. Однако вместе они гораздо сильнее, чем порознь.

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Shattered Crystal - трейлер к выходу игры

ZA.name: Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal
ZA.description: In Sonic Boom™: Shattered Crystal, Amy discovers a secret ancient language and manuscript detailing the history and whereabouts of a Lost Crystal of Power. The evil and vile villain, Lyric, kidnaps Amy in his eagerness to get his claws on this long-forgotten power that has been hidden throughout the jungles and canyons of a mysterious new island. Sonic must team up with Tails, Knuckles and newest member of the team Sticks who is Amy’s best friend as they follow her footsteps to save her from the clutches of Lyric and his robot army. Lyric is bent on powering up his army of robots and stopping Sonic and team at all costs in his quest to destroy the world. By working as a team, they will prove they are stronger together than they are apart.

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Shattered Crystal - Launch Trailer
